title: I NEED HELP ASAP
body: When i press on the new client and it opens, the circle turns around for ages and it never stops, when i try to open the old client, im getting bug splatted, plz help, it started happening when i installed the 7.1 update

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
Dont need to anymore man, i installed lol on a new computer
